attributes.name: Portau's Broken Sword
attributes.description: The weapon of a mighty warrior.
attributes.parsed_description: The weapon of a mighty warrior.

attributes.name: Potent Corruption Ichor
attributes.description: Globs of concentrated Corruption, from those fresh from a portal.
attributes.parsed_description: Globs of concentrated Corruption, from those fresh from a portal.

attributes.name: Potent Solvent
attributes.description: A potent solvent used in advanced weaving.
attributes.parsed_description: A potent solvent used in advanced weaving.

attributes.name: Potent Venom Sac
attributes.description: A thin membrane is all that stands between you and certain death.
attributes.parsed_description: A thin membrane is all that stands between you and certain death.

attributes.name: Pound of Corrupted Flesh
attributes.description: Once thrown into the forge, the heat will burn away the matter and leave only raw Corrupted power to imbue into the blade.
attributes.parsed_description: Once thrown into the forge, the heat will burn away the matter and leave only raw Corrupted power to imbue into the blade.

attributes.name: Powdered Starmetal Shards
attributes.description: A finely ground powder of starmetal shards, for some unknown purpose.
attributes.parsed_description: A finely ground powder of starmetal shards, for some unknown purpose.

attributes.name: Powerful Dryad Sap
attributes.description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Constitution and Focus to an item.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Constitution and Focus to an item.

attributes.name: Powerful Quartz Crystal
attributes.description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Constitution and Strength to an item.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in crafting to apply a bonus of Constitution and Strength to an item.

attributes.name: Powerful Vocal Chords
attributes.description: These Vocal Chords could express sounds powerful enough to knock an armored adult off their feet.
attributes.parsed_description: These Vocal Chords could express sounds powerful enough to knock an armored adult off their feet.

attributes.name: Practice Golem
attributes.description: A practice dummy enchanted to react to strikes.
attributes.parsed_description: A practice dummy enchanted to react to strikes.

attributes.name: Precision Armoring Tools
attributes.description: A set of precision armoring tools used to finish a project. Improve your Armoring trophy with this.

attributes.name: Precision-Engineered Barrel
attributes.description: The Myrkgard were once known for their superior weaponsmiths. A finer rifle barrel has yet to be made.
